name: Touhou Hakanai Cards / 东方幻灵录
name_original: Touhou Hakanai Cards / 东方幻灵录
description:
Touhou Hakanai Cards is a SLG game includes TCG elements. All the roles and cards are come from Touhou Project, you can use these distinctive characters to organize your own team. Enjoy the diversified combinations and exquisite role CG, Let's use the varied and graceful character cards to fight!
Support 2 to 4 PLAYERS Online Combat!
